thread.section_title: Barbeques Galore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Barbeques Galore | barbequesgalore.com.au
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text:
I was marking time in Barbecues Galore while waiting for a nearby business to open. I was in the market for a barbecue but in no hurry to purchase. I engaged with staff member Aron who is pleasant, very knowledgeable and impressively enthusiastic about the whole barbecue experience.
Based on his recommendation a week later we purchased a Traeger pellet grill and having used it several times, could not be happier.
